display_long_description:
Welcome to My Perfect Mine, a relaxing yet engaging VR mining simulator where you manage your very own mining crew! Dive into a vibrant canyon filled with glowing gem rocks and lead your team of cartoon-style miners to dig, smash, and haul resources.

Use your pickaxe, upgrade your workers, and unlock faster production lines. Strategically expand your mining operation, build conveyor belts, deploy new miners, and automate your workflow to build the ultimate mining empire!

With intuitive VR controls, charming low-poly visuals, and satisfying mining mechanics, My Perfect Mine is the perfect casual game to unwind and enjoy resource management in a fun and colorful environment.

Whether you're a tycoon enthusiast or a fan of idle VR games, My Perfect Mine delivers addictive gameplay and endless expansion opportunities. Grab your headset and start digging!
